topic.title: Isometric Islands First Draft: Please post scenes as soon as then are ready for quick feedback!
topic.text:
Hi Everyone!

    • This is a feedback thread for the first draft of your Colorscope projects. When classes resume, we will most likely be an online class for a period of time. This will be a virtual critique thread.
    • Please post a link to your first draft of your Isometric Islands project by 4/6/2020 at 9AM.  Upload your Isometric Islands project to your vimeo account. Then link to or embed the vimeo video in your post.
      • Instructions for getting your embed code from vimeo. 
      • Instructions for embedding the video in the canvas post.
      • An embedded video will appear in the post, just like the example below.

exchangeRate from casey farina on Vimeo.

  • If you project is ready before that please feel free to post the first draft to receive feedback from myself and other students. 
  • Some tips on rendering faster (up to 100x faster using OpenGL)
    • FilterSwitch.zip
  • Please respond to at least three classmates projects and use the following format
    • Positive (list three aspects of the design, animation, and execution that your thought worked well)
      • one
      • two
      • three
    • Suggested Changes (list three specific changes you would suggest for this project. Please be specific, use time codes to let the creator know what section should be adjusted. Pay particular attention to the tweening, design, composition, use of color, sound, and music)
      • one
      • two
      • three
